definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (mng. dub.; Thes ´[[י]] hath adorned (as Heb. [[עדה]] Hiph.; vb. of Pa. form); MV ´[[י]] is equipment, cf. Ar. 9ud=ah;un; possibly ´[[י]] hath carried off spoil, or hath deposed (Targum [[עדא]] Pe Pa Aph; cf. Haph. Da 2:21); or perh. ´[[י]] hath numbered Ar. 9ad=a)—a descendant of Saul 1Ch 8:36, 1Ch 8:36 (LXX )Iwada, A )Iwiada, LXXL )Iwda) = [[יַעְרָה]] 1Ch 9:42, 1Ch 9:42 (for [[יׁעַדָּה]] ? cf. Be. LXX )Iada, LXXL )Iwda.
